title: The Lost
description: What do Vampires fear? They fear the Order. What do Werewolves fear? They fear the Order. What do all the demons that walk the face of the earth fear? They fear the Order. What is the Order?That is the question that Kimberly Jenkins has when she is rescued from a horde of demons by three knights of the Order. Thus begins Kimberly's quest for knowledge that will lead her on a magical, yet desperate, journey from continent to continent as she attempts to answer the question, how can you redeem a demon?
author: T. Galer
